General.Description: Civic (CVC) is a decentralized ecosystem that help the participants to have the best security but lower cost than accessing other coins through the blockchain. Moreover, the CVC provides the identity verificationby and a digital Identity platform. This information will go through a verification process conducted by the identity validators on the platform and then ported into the blockchain where service providers can access it with the proper permission from the user.
General.Features: The payments that are made by CVC are so easy and convenient. It was built on Ethereum-based token, therefore, the users can easily access the acquired information. Moreover, the smart contract system in CVC is so helpful so the users can deliver quickly to both the validator.
General.Technology: The security that was set up by CVC is so safe, especially by using the Civic Secure ID. Moreover, the participants can access partner websites and services so easily on the Civic app. Last but not least, via the decentralized architecture with the blockchain and biometrics, the Secure Identity Platform enable provides multi-factor authentication without a username, password, third-party authenticator, or physical hardware token.
